T02D3400:60b-1: s'a dha na aas mutstsha ya n'a ma /
T02D3400:60b-3: sgrub thabs kun las btus pa zhes bya ba /
T02D3400:60b-4: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3400:60b-5: srid dang ngan 'gros du ba rnams la /
T02D3400:60b-6: bde dang phun tshogs kun 'byung zhing //
T02D3400:60b-7: yid bzhin nor ltar rmad byung ba'i //
T02D3400:60b-8: dpal ldan dam tshig gsum phyag 'tshal //
T02D3400:60b-9: slob dpon sngon ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D3400:60b-10: yang dag yod bzhin 'dir ston pa //
T02D3400:60b-11: ci ste mngags pas 'jigs rnams la //
T02D3400:60b-12: bsdus nas nye bar bstan par bya //
T02D3400:60b-13: 'di nyid du dpal ldan dam tshig gsum gyi rgyal
T02D3400:60b-14: po'i rgyud chen po'i dkyil 'khor du rdul tshon gyi
T02D3400:60b-15: dkyil 'khor la spyir dbang bskur ba thob pa de
T02D3400:60b-16: las gsungs pa rnams sngags pa dam tshig dang sdom
T02D3400:60b-17: pa la gnas pas sngon du bsnyen pa bya ste
T02D3400:60b-18: / ri dang dgon pa la sogs pa rnams su
T02D3400:60b-19: phug gam khyim mam skyed mos tshal la sogs pa'ang
T02D3400:60b-20: / rung ste / gtsang zhing skye bos dben pa yid du 'ong ba rnams su gnas nas /
T02D3400:60b-21: dang po re zhig 'dir rtsa ba'i sngags ni sangs
T02D3400:60b-22: rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyi drung du mandal me tog
T02D3400:60b-23: sil ma mngon par bkram ste /
T02D3400:60b-24: phyag 'tshal nas byang chub tu sems bskyed bya zhing
T02D3400:60b-25: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la
T02D3400:60b-26: bdag nyid nges par phul nas de la phyag 'tshal
T02D3400:60b-27: bar dmigs nas bzlas pa brtsam par bya ste stong
T02D3400:60b-29: de nas sngags thams cad 'bum bzlas par bya ba yin no //
T02D3400:60b-30: srung ba la sogs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyis 'di'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02D3400:60b-32: na ma:sarba buddha bo dhi sa tv'a n'am /
T02D3400:60b-33: aa ma l'a ma la h'a ra ka aa nant'a:sarba
T02D3400:60b-34: bh'u t'a:sarba dzi n'a aa s'i ma nishth'a ba ra
T02D3400:60b-35: d'a ma ma de tu aa tyu d'a ram ba
T02D3400:60b-36: ra ma / gryam sa ma sarba d'a aa nantam ta tra me badzra pa d'a /
T02D3400:60b-37: aa ra ra aa sa ma sa ma sa mant'a nant'a dharma te /
T02D3400:60b-39: ma h'a b'i r'a tsa le /
T02D3400:60b-41: aa sa ha ma h'a ba le /
T02D3400:60b-43: ma h'a b'a r'a gri ke ha ha ha ha badzra badzra aa dh'a ye dha ra h'um h'um /
T02D3400:60b-44: manda lam sa ma ba l'a gra bi kra me ku ru ku ru /
T02D3400:60b-46: sarba th'a sarbam hi dzva la dzva la /
T02D3400:60b-47: aa gre aa gri ni h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3400:60b-48: de nas las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad pa'i
T02D3400:60b-49: don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying
T02D3400:60b-50: po yi ge brgya pa'i chogs stong phrag brgyad bzlas
T02D3400:60b-51: par bya'o // dam pa'i chos sun phyung ba dang
T02D3400:60b-52: mtshams med pa la sogs pa'i las kyi sgrib pa
T02D3400:60b-54: na ma stvee ya dhvi k'a n'am ta th'a ga t'a n'a na /
T02D3400:61a-0: sarba tr'a pra ti ha ta b'apti dharma ta ba li n'am aa sa ma sa ma @61a * //
T02D3400:61a-2: aa nanta t'a b'abti sh'a sa na /
T02D3400:61a-4: sma ra sma ra ne bi ga ta r'a ga buddha dharma te /
T02D3400:61a-10: ma h'a ba ra laksha ne /
T02D3400:61a-11: dzva la dzva la na s'a ga re sv'a h'a /
T02D3400:61a-12: de nas rang dang gzhan gyi dge ba'i phyir /
T02D3400:61a-13: sgrub thabs kyi cho ga'i yan lag bzhin sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho gas rjes su gnas par bya'o //
T02D3400:61a-14: de la dang po rab tu snga bar langs te /
T02D3400:61a-15: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
T02D3400:61a-16: bdag po rnams la lhag pa'i bsam pas de bzhin du phyag 'tshal nas /
T02D3400:61a-17: mtha' yas 'jig rten khams rnams na //
T02D3400:61a-18: ji snyed rgyal ba sras bcas la //
T02D3400:61a-19: lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis //
T02D3400:61a-20: kun nas bdag ni phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3400:61a-21: de nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya ste /
T02D3400:61a-22: lus can rnams kyi byang chub phyir //
T02D3400:61a-23: yang dag byang chub sems bskyed nas //
T02D3400:61a-24: sems can kun la sman gyur phyir //
T02D3400:61a-25: bzang po spyod pa spyad par bgyi //
T02D3400:61a-26: de nas bgegs thams cad gzhom pa'i don du mi
T02D3400:61a-27: g-yo ba'i snying po don yod gtum po rdo rje'i
T02D3400:61a-28: phyag rgya bcings nas lan gsum brjod par bya'o //
T02D3400:61a-29: de la 'dir rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni lag pa
T02D3400:61a-30: g-yas pa spyi bor brkyang nas mthe bo che'i mdzub
T02D3400:61a-31: mo'i rtse mo mnan par bya'o //
T02D3400:61a-32: lhag ma ni rdo rje'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D3400:61a-35: aa mo gha tsanda ma h'a ro sha na phat ya /
T02D3400:61a-36: aom bhra ma ya bhra ma ya /
T02D3400:61a-39: sor mo rnams 'khyud la khu tshur gyis nang du byas nas /
T02D3400:61a-42: mthe bong dang gung mo'i rtse dag kyang cung zad ma reg par gzung bar bya'o //
T02D3400:61a-44: aom ha ra ha ra ma h'a ni minta h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3400:61a-45: de nas zhal bsang ba la sogs pa byas nas stan bde ba la nye bar gnas te /
T02D3400:61a-46: ras ris dang po ti dang sku gzugs la sogs pa dang /
T02D3400:61a-47: gzhan gyi drung du'ang rung ste /
T02D3400:61a-48: phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dmigs te /
T02D3400:61a-49: me tog sil ma gtsal du bkram la mandal byas
T02D3400:61a-50: nas sngon ma bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa dang
T02D3400:61a-51: / yan lag thams cad kyis phyag btsal nas /
T02D3400:61a-52: de bzhin du sangs rgyas dang /
T02D3400:61a-53: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdag nyid phul nas /
T02D3400:61a-54: byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya ba ni /
T02D3400:61a-55: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba sangs rgyas dang /
T02D3400:61b-0: @61b byang chub sems dpa' rnams la thams cad du
T02D3400:61b-1: bdag nyid 'bul bas dus thams cad du gzung du
T02D3400:61b-3: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
T02D3400:61b-4: mgon po thugs rje chen po rnams kyis bdag la
T02D3400:61b-5: mchog gi dngos grub rnams stsal du gsol zhes so
T02D3400:61b-6: // de nas sdig pa thams cad bshags par bya ste /
T02D3400:61b-9: gti mug las skyes pa'i dus thams cad kyi sdig
T02D3400:61b-10: pa thams cad ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
T02D3400:61b-11: rnams kyis mkhyen bzhin du ma lus par bdag gis
T02D3400:61b-12: bshags par bgyi'o // de nas bsod nams la rjes su yi rang ba ni /
T02D3400:61b-14: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gang zhig 'jig rten dang /
T02D3400:61b-15: 'jig rten las 'das pa ji ltar dus gsum gyi
T02D3400:61b-16: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mkhyen pa'i rjes
T02D3400:61b-17: su yi rang ba'i mchog de rnams la rjes su
T02D3400:61b-18: yi rang ngo // de nas skyil mo krung gis
T02D3400:61b-19: gnas nas 'dir dam tshig phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o
T02D3400:61b-20: yi rang ngo // // thal mo sbyar ba spyi bor bzhag pa ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D3400:61b-22: nam:su siddhi s'a dha ni aa gre k'a ru ne /
T02D3400:61b-23: ba ra de ta yi ta yi aa ti pa
T02D3400:61b-24: le na ma stu ba ra siddhi da ya ke
T02D3400:61b-25: bhyo:ma h'a kri se bhya:sv'a h'a /
T02D3400:61b-26: 'di ni phyag rgya thams cad kyi sngags rnams kyi
T02D3400:61b-27: dam tshig la yang dag par mthong bar 'gyur ro
T02D3400:61b-28: // de nas sngon bzhin du rdo rje'i phyag rgya
T02D3400:61b-29: bcings nas mi g-yo ba'i snying po rjes su dran
T02D3400:61b-30: // par bya'o // nam:sa manta badzr'a n'am /
T02D3400:61b-31: aa tsa la k'a na tsanda s'a dha ya h'um phat /
T02D3400:61b-32: de nas rdo rje gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya spyi bor dgod par bya ste /
T02D3400:61b-33: lag pa g-yas pa'i khu tshur la mthe bong gnas par bya'o //
T02D3400:61b-35: na ma:sarba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'am tri shi kh'a gri na me stu te sa manta /
T02D3400:61b-36: da sh'a mantr'a gri gu na aa tsa lo gra /
T02D3400:61b-37: dharma bi dhu n'a hi kle sha du:kha dz'a l'a
T02D3400:61b-38: na dza ga ta:sarba su kh'am da d'a ham tsa
T02D3400:61b-39: shu tra tre ya ma tri sa ma ye ku
T02D3400:61b-40: ru sv'a h'a / 'dis ni sngags pa rnams la mi zad pa'i srung ba chen po ste /
T02D3400:61b-41: bgegs med pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02D3400:61b-42: slar yang mi tshugs pa'i srung ba chen po gnas
T02D3400:61b-43: lnga rnams su dgod pa byas pas srung ba chen
T02D3400:61b-44: por 'gyur ro // thal mo gan rkyal du byas
T02D3400:61b-45: nas mthe'u chung dang ming med lag pa'i mthil du
T02D3400:61b-46: por 'gyur ro // byas te / mthe'u chung gi rtse mo phyir bya'o //
T02D3400:62a-1: med cung zad dma' bar byas nas /
T02D3400:62a-2: de'i steng du mthe bong dgod par bya'o //
T02D3400:62a-3: gung mo dag rtse mor byas te de'i logs su
T02D3400:62a-4: mdzub mo cung zad pa bkug nas tshigs gsum par
T02D3400:62a-5: bkod pa ni mi tshugs pa zhes bya ba'i phyag
T02D3400:62a-10: de nas go cha chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa rdo rje'i go char bya ste /
T02D3400:62a-11: mthe'u chung dang mtheb chen dag lcags sgrog tu byas nas gzhan rnams rtsa ba dang /
T02D3400:62a-12: dbus dang rtse mo yang dag par sbyar ba ni gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D3400:62a-15: aom ham h'um badzra ma ye /
T02D3400:62a-16: ba k'a ba tse ho badzra badzra h'um phat /
T02D3400:62a-17: de de bzhin du byas pas bdud rnams kyis shin tu mi tshugs par 'gyur ro //
T02D3400:62a-18: de ltar bdag nyid srung bar byas nas gnas bsrung bar bya'o //
T02D3400:62a-19: de la rdo rje gdan gyi phyag rgyas /
T02D3400:62a-20: rdo rje gdan gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D3400:62a-21: rdo rje skyil krung bcings nas pang du lag pa
T02D3400:62a-22: g-yon pa gan rkyal du byas pa'i steng du lag
T02D3400:62a-23: pa g-yas pa bzhag pa ni rdo rje gdan gyi
T02D3400:62a-26: aom ham h'um badzr'a sa ne bam h'um phat /
T02D3400:62a-27: de nas rdo rje'i gzhal yas khang gi phyag rgyas
T02D3400:62a-28: rang gi gnas rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis
T02D3400:62a-30: thal mo sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis dang ming med
T02D3400:62a-31: gnyis kyang tshigs dbus ma bkug nas nang du bcug
T02D3400:62a-32: ste / ka ba bzhi bzhin du byas nas /
T02D3400:62a-33: lhag ma rtse mor byas pa ni rdo rje'i gzhal yas khang gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D3400:62a-37: badzr'a gra bhu ba ni mam h'um phat /
T02D3400:62a-38: de nas rdo rje'i ra ba'i phyag rgya de la dgod par bya ste /
T02D3400:62a-39: thal mo gan rkyal du byas nas ming med gnyis dbus su byas /
T02D3400:62a-40: gung mo rtse mor byas te /
T02D3400:62a-41: mdzub mo gnyis rdo rje'i rnam pas tshigs gsum par dgod do //
T02D3400:62a-42: mthe bo dag la logs su byas pa ni /
T02D3400:62a-48: ban dha ban dha h'um phat /
T02D3400:62a-49: de nas de'i steng du rdo rje'i gur te /
T02D3400:62a-50: de'i phyag rgya dgod par bya ste /
T02D3400:62a-51: thal mo sbyar nas ming med gnyis dang /
T02D3400:62a-52: mdzub mo gnyis phyir bzlog nas rgyab tu bcag ste /
T02D3400:62a-54: de bzhin du mthe'u chung dang mthe bo dgod de gur gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D3400:62b-2: badzr'a gra bhu ba ne h'um h'um phat /
T02D3400:62b-3: de nas rdo rje 'bar ba ni phyi rol te de'i phyag rgya dgod par bya ste /
T02D3400:62b-4: lag pa mi 'jigs par bya ba'i steng du /
T02D3400:62b-5: lag pa g-yon pa'i sor mo'i tshigs g-yas su bskor ba ni rdo rje 'bar ba'o //
T02D3400:62b-10: de nas mtshams bcing bar bya ste /
T02D3400:62b-11: lag pa g-yas pa khu tshur bcings nas /
T02D3400:62b-12: sdigs mdzub bsgreng ste g-yas su bskor ba ni mtshams med pa ste mtshams bcing ba'o //
T02D3400:62b-19: de nas de bzhin du srung ba dang /
T02D3400:62b-20: yo byad dang bcas pas rang gi gnas su gnas nas /
T02D3400:62b-21: ji ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams
T02D3400:62b-22: la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod pa'i phyag rgyas
T02D3400:62b-24: de nas dngos grub kyi mchog ster ba po rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro ;
T02D3400:62b-25: / lag pa khu tshur bcings nas mthe'u chung nas
T02D3400:62b-26: dgrol ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod pa'i
T02D3400:62b-28: na ma:sarba buddha bo dhi sa tv'a n'am aa:aa ma la bi kranta te dzi ni /
T02D3400:62b-30: de nas phyi'i dri dang nye bar spyad kyi yo
T02D3400:62b-31: byad la rdo rje mi g-yo ba'i phyag rgyas yongs
T02D3400:62b-32: su sbyangs te dri la sogs pa rnams so so
T02D3400:62b-33: la rang gi sngags kyis lan brgyad du mngon par
T02D3400:62b-36: na ma stree yam dhvi k'a n'am sarba ta th'a ga t'a n'am /
T02D3400:62b-37: aa sa ma gandho ta me bha b'a ti /
T02D3400:62b-38: sba ra hi mam ga ga na kam ma ho da ye /
T02D3400:62b-39: sarb'artha s'a dha ni sv'a h'a /
T02D3400:62b-41: na ma stree ya dhvi k'a n'am /
T02D3400:62b-42: sarba ta th'a ga t'a n'am /
T02D3400:62b-43: aa bart'a barta ma h'a su kha ba ti sv'a h'a /
T02D3400:62b-45: na mastree yam dhvi k'a m'am sarba ta th'a ga t'a n'am /
T02D3400:62b-46: aa gre aa gra ni khe /
T02D3400:62b-47: aa gra shi she dhu ma shi she sv'a h'a /
T02D3400:62b-49: na mastree yam dhvi k'a n'am /
T02D3400:62b-50: sarba ta th'a ga t'a n'am aa lante dzv'a lante d'i pa dzye ti shi khe sv'a h'a /
T02D3400:62b-52: na mastree yam dhvi k'a n'am /
T02D3400:62b-53: sarba ta th'a ga t'a n'am /
T02D3400:62b-57: ba li de ba li da d'a hi ma h'a ba li sv'a h'a /
T02D3400:62b-58: de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod
T02D3400:62b-59: pa'i sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa gzhan yang dbul bar
T02D3400:62b-60: bya'o // phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar nas /
T02D3400:63a-0: bdag pos yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi @63a * //
T02D3400:63a-1: khams kyi mchod pa'i yan lag khyad par du 'phags
T02D3400:63a-2: pa thang las skyes pa'i rin po che'i ri bo
T02D3400:63a-3: dang / dpag bsam gyi shing la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02D3400:63a-4: chu las skyes pa rgya mtsho'i rin po che la sogs pa gser dang /
T02D3400:63a-5: chu skyes la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02D3400:63a-6: gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams rnams na gang zhig lha dang mi sna tshogs pa'i gzugs dang /
T02D3400:63a-10: reg bya la sogs pa de rnams thams cad sangs rgyas dang /
T02D3400:63a-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdag gis dbul bar bgyi'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D3400:63a-12: yid kyis rang bzhin gyi mchod pa'i sprin de bzhin du rab tu dbul bar bya'o //
T02D3400:63a-13: gang ba'i phyag rgya rtse mo cung zad bkug nas
T02D3400:63a-14: phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar ba'i mtshan nyid bcings
T02D3400:63a-15: nas de bzhin du byas te /
T02D3400:63a-17: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs dang /
T02D3400:63a-20: rig sngags kyi stobs kyis sangs rgyas dang /
T02D3400:63a-21: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la
T02D3400:63a-22: mchog tu rgya chen po byang chub sems dpa' kun
T02D3400:63a-23: du bzang po'i spyod pa las mngon par thob pa'i
T02D3400:63a-24: mchod pa'i sprin chen po rab tu 'phro bar bsams
T02D3400:63a-25: nas / 'dir mchod pa byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D3400:63a-26: rig pa chen mo'i rgyal mo lan brgyad du brjod par bya'o //
T02D3400:63a-27: na ma:sarba buddha bo dhi satva n'am /
T02D3400:63a-29: aung+ga te spha ra na hi mam ga ga na kham sa manta:sv'a h'a /
T02D3400:63a-31: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i yon tan brjod cing /
T02D3400:63a-32: glu dbyangs kyi sprin gyi rgya mtsho dang /
T02D3400:63a-33: chos kyi glu dbyangs kyi sprin gyi rgya mtsho rnams
T02D3400:63a-34: yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
T02D3400:63a-36: 'dir glu dbyangs kyi bstod pa'i sprin rnams kyis mchod
T02D3400:63a-37: par byas nas rig pa'i rgyal mo 'di lan brgyad
T02D3400:63a-39: na ma:sarba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'am /
T02D3400:63a-40: sarba sa tra sam ku su mi t'a bi dzny'a r'a shi ni na ma stu te sv'a h'a /
T02D3400:63a-41: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgya mtsho thams
T02D3400:63a-42: cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi
T02D3400:63a-43: rang bzhin dang / mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
T02D3400:63a-44: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sprin
T02D3400:63a-45: tshogs rnams kyi nges par spyod pa'i mdzad pa kun
T02D3400:63b-0: gyis sems @63b can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams
T02D3400:63b-1: cad rab tu zhi ba dang /
T02D3400:63b-3: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa ji snyed pa /
T02D3400:63b-4: kun du bzang po la sogs pa yongs su dag
T02D3400:63b-5: pa thob par bsam par byas nas rig pa'i rgyal
T02D3400:63b-6: mo chen mo 'di lan brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3400:63b-7: na ma:sarba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'am /
T02D3400:63b-8: na ma stu te ma h'a badzra sarba satva hi ka ra /
T02D3400:63b-11: aa dhi shtha ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3400:63b-12: 'di rnams thams cad mchod pa la sogs pa'i sngags
T02D3400:63b-13: kyi stobs kyis bden pa'i rang bzhin du mos pa
T02D3400:63b-14: bya zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa
T02D3400:63b-15: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
T02D3400:63b-16: bsngo bar bya'o // ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan
T02D3400:63b-17: 'das rnams kyis mngon du rjes su mkhyen nas yongs
T02D3400:63b-18: su bsngo ba dang ldan pa bzhin du dge ba'i
T02D3400:63b-19: rtsa ba 'di yang de bzhin du bdag gis yongs
T02D3400:63b-21: bsod nams 'dis bdag kun du bzang po'i spyod pas
T02D3400:63b-22: mngon par byang chub nas sems can thams cad kyang
T02D3400:63b-23: kun du bzang po'i spyod pa dag pa la rab
T02D3400:63b-24: tu gnas par gyur cig / de nas sangs rgyas
T02D3400:63b-25: dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byin gyi
T02D3400:63b-26: rlabs kyis so sor thob pa'i don du de'i phyag
T02D3400:63b-27: rgya bcings nas sngon du gsungs pa'i yi ge brgya
T02D3400:63b-28: pa rjes su dran par bya'o //
T02D3400:63b-29: yang na yi ge lnga pa'o //
T02D3400:63b-30: lag pa gnyis phan tshun rgyab sbyar nas sor mo rnams steng du kha sbyar te /
T02D3400:63b-32: mthe'u chung dag lcags sgrog gi rnam par byas nas
T02D3400:63b-33: gung mo dang ming med dbus su rtse mor byas
T02D3400:63b-34: / mtheb chen gnyis mnyam du steng du rtse mo bstan pa ni yi ge brgya pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D3400:63b-35: yi ge lnga pa'i phyag rgya ni thal mo yang
T02D3400:63b-36: dag par sbyar nas mdzub mo gnyis kyis mtheb chen
T02D3400:63b-38: lhag ma ni de bzhin du rtse mo'i rnam pa'o //
T02D3400:63b-40: na ma:sarba buddha po dhi satv'a n'am /
T02D3400:63b-42: de nas phyag rgya thams cad yang dag par bsdus
T02D3400:63b-43: pa las byung ba kun gyi gtsug tor snang ba
T02D3400:63b-44: chos kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
T02D3400:63b-45: lag pa gan rkyal du mnyam du brkyang nas /
T02D3400:63b-46: mi 'jigs pa'i lag pas ming med lag pa'i dkyil dang /
T02D3400:63b-47: mtheb chen gyi rtse mor sen mos san mo yongs
T02D3400:63b-48: su bzung ste mtheb chung rtse mo'i rnam par byas
T02D3400:63b-49: te / tshigs kyi rtse mo de bzhin du gung
T02D3400:63b-50: mo dang mnyam du sen mo'i rtse mor byas pa
T02D3400:64a-0: ni gtsug tor kun du snang @64a * //
T02D3400:64a-2: de bzhin du de rnams kyi mdzub mo dag bkug nas sen mo'i rtse mo la sbyar te /
T02D3400:64a-3: mandal gyi rnam pa ni chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D3400:64a-4: sngags 'di dag go rims ji lta ba bzhin du'o //
T02D3400:64a-5: a'am mam ham aom dhu na ya ta yatstshanda tsa kre na badzri ni h'um /
T02D3400:64a-6: 'di dag gis sngags gzhan yang bcings nas lan cig brjod de /
T02D3400:64a-7: gnas shing 'dug nas bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3400:64a-8: bdud la sogs pa rnams zil gyis gnon cing /
T02D3400:64a-9: dngos grub rnams mngon du byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D3400:64a-10: de nas dngos grub myur pa'i don du chos 'byung
T02D3400:64a-11: gi phyag rgyas bcings nas de'i sngags rjes su dran
T02D3400:64a-12: par bya'o // lag pa g-yon pas khu tshur bcangs
T02D3400:64a-13: nas mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung steng du brkyang ba
T02D3400:64a-16: na ma:sarba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'am aa:sarba th'a sarba tr'an ke sv'a h'a /
T02D3400:64a-17: rang gi phyag rgyas kyang sngags lan cig brjod nas dam tshig blta bar bya'o //
T02D3400:64a-18: rang gi phyag rgyas ji ltar sbyar bar rig par bya'o //
T02D3400:64a-20: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar dmigs nas bzlas pa brtsam par bya ste /
T02D3400:64a-24: mi bden pa'i rtog pa spangs nas /
T02D3400:64a-25: sngags kyi yi ge la sems ji srid ngal bar ma gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3400:64a-26: de nas langs nas 'phags pa sdong po bkod pa'i
T02D3400:64a-27: mdo la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po
T02D3400:64a-28: lan cig rjes su dran par byas te bklag par
T02D3400:64a-29: bya'o // mchod pa'i mthar phyag 'tshal nas zas bza'o //
T02D3400:64a-30: zas za ba'i dus su yang sngags 'dis zas la
T02D3400:64a-31: lan brgyad du mngon par bsngags nas phud kyi chad
T02D3400:64a-32: bu bzhag ste / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T02D3400:64a-33: dpa' thams cad la zhal zas phul nas bar ma
T02D3400:64a-36: na ma:sarba buddha bo dhi satv'a n'am /
T02D3400:64a-37: aom ba lim da d'a te dzo ma li ni sv'a h'a /
T02D3400:64a-38: zas zos pa'i lhag ma 'phags pa mi g-yo ba
T02D3400:64a-39: don yod gtum po'i snying pos lan cig mngon par
T02D3400:64a-40: bsngags nas lhag ma'i chang bu sbyin par bya'o //
T02D3400:64a-41: de dang rjes su 'brel pas dngos grub ci bde ba ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3400:64a-42: zos pa dang ngal bsos pa'i mthar yang sdig pa
T02D3400:64a-43: bshags pa la sogs pa byas nas dam pa'i chos
T02D3400:64b-0: kyi gtam la sogs @64b pas gnas par bya'o //
T02D3400:64b-2: phyi dro'i dus su yang thams cad bsrung ba la sogs pa yongs su bya ba dang /
T02D3400:64b-3: mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D3400:64b-4: yang na snga dro'i thun la /
T02D3400:64b-5: de bzhin du srung ba la sogs pa ma gshegs par gnas pa la /
T02D3400:64b-6: de bzhin du mos pa brtan pos 'phags pa mi
T02D3400:64b-7: g-yo pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bgegs thams cad bskrad
T02D3400:64b-8: nas / yi ge lnga pa la sogs pa rnams
T02D3400:64b-9: kyi phyag rgya gzhan dang bcas pas srung ba byas
T02D3400:64b-10: nas / nas / mchod pa dang bstod pa la sogs pa'i cho ga sngon bzhin du byas te /
T02D3400:64b-12: phyi dro'i dus su yang ra ba dang gur la
T02D3400:64b-13: sogs pa gshegs nas 'od zer phreng bas go cha
T02D3400:64b-14: bya'o // phan tshun du sor mo rnams 'khyud pa
T02D3400:64b-15: nang du khu tshur bcangs te gung mo rtse mo'i
T02D3400:64b-16: rnam par byas nas brkyang pa la mdzub mo gnyis
T02D3400:64b-17: de'i tshigs gsum par bzhag ste /
T02D3400:64b-18: mthe bong dag la logs su byas pa ni /
T02D3400:64b-19: 'od zer gyi phreng ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D3400:64b-21: na ma:stree ya dhvi k'a n'am /
T02D3400:64b-22: ta th'a ga t'a n'am ma h'a sa ma ya ga te ga te /
T02D3400:64b-23: sa ma te sa ma te /
T02D3400:64b-24: sa ma sarba th'a satv'a tra na ke //
T02D3400:64b-25: dharma dhva tv'a rya na t'a sam ga te sv'a h'a /
T02D3400:64b-27: cha smad la mi nyal bar dam pa'i chos kyi kha ton la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D3400:64b-28: gung thun la khri la sogs pa spangs pa'i nyal sa la sangs rgyas dang /
T02D3400:64b-29: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la yan lag thams
T02D3400:64b-30: cad kyis phyag 'tshal ba bzhin du nyal bar bya'o
T02D3400:64b-32: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bla na med
T02D3400:64b-33: pa'i dngos grub kyi mchog ster ba po thams cad
T02D3400:64b-34: kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
T02D3400:64b-35: bar du gcod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad du gsol zhes so //
T02D3400:64b-36: de bzhin du chog 'dis nyi ma so so la
T02D3400:64b-37: ji srid zla ba gang gang gi bar du 'bum
T02D3400:64b-38: bzlas par bya'o // yang na ji srid dngos grub kyi mtshan ma ma byung gi bar du'o //
T02D3400:64b-39: de nas zla ba la sogs pa'i tshes grangs la
T02D3400:64b-40: zas bcad cing smyung bar gnas nas gso sbyong gi
T02D3400:64b-41: sdom pa gzung bar bya ba ni /
T02D3400:64b-43: ku sha'i chun po'i steng du nye bar bsdad nas mchod rten dang /
T02D3400:64b-44: thang sku dang po ti dang /
T02D3400:64b-45: sku gzugs la sogs pa gzhan ji ltar rnyed pa'i
T02D3400:64b-46: drung du me tog sil ma gcal du bkram pa'i
T02D3400:64b-47: mandal byas nas srung ba dang /
T02D3400:64b-48: mchod pa'i bya ba byas nas /
T02D3400:65a-2: de'i sngags rjes su dran par bya'o //
T02D3400:65a-3: de nas rang gi lha'i phyag rgya bcings te /
T02D3400:65a-4: de'i sngags bdun nam brgyad bzlas nas dam tshig blta bar bya'o //
T02D3400:65a-6: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal te
T02D3400:65a-7: 'khor lo dang rdo rje la sogs pa 'dzin pa'i
T02D3400:65a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa kun du bzang po'i sku la
T02D3400:65a-9: sogs pa dag cing rang gis mngon par 'dod pa'i
T02D3400:65a-10: dngos grub kyi snying po blang ba'i phyir sangs rgyas
T02D3400:65a-11: dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal bar dmigs nas /
T02D3400:65a-14: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams dang
T02D3400:65a-15: ye shes kyi tshogs la rjes su yi rang ba
T02D3400:65a-16: la yid kyis goms par byas nas nyi ma nub
T02D3400:65a-18: ji srid na ma phyed kyi bar ram /
T02D3400:65a-19: nyi ma shar gyi bar de srid du bzlas pas
T02D3400:65a-20: 'khor lo la sogs pa rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur
T02D3400:65a-21: ro // 'bar ba dang nam mkha' la sangs rgyas
T02D3400:65a-22: la sogs pa byon pa bzhin du rtags chen po
T02D3400:65a-23: ro // rnams dang / me tog gi char dang /
T02D3400:65a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis legs so zhes brjod pa la sogs pa dang /
T02D3400:65a-27: sangs rgyas kyi zhing g-yo ba la sogs pa shin
T02D3400:65a-28: tu ngo mtshar ba rnams kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro
T02D3400:65a-29: // rig pa 'dzin pa'i rig pa thams cad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3400:65a-30: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
T02D3400:65a-31: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mngon par dbang bskur bar 'gyur zhing /
T02D3400:65a-32: mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa dang /
T02D3400:65a-34: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa dang /
T02D3400:65a-35: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing /
T02D3400:65a-36: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro //
T02D3400:65a-37: rig pa mtha' yas pa 'dzin pa'i bud med kyi
T02D3400:65a-38: 'khor lus ma nyams pa rnams kyis bde bar rjes
T02D3400:65a-40: de bzhin du yang lus la sogs pa'i rim pas
T02D3400:65a-41: tshogs bsags pas byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad
T02D3400:65a-42: non par 'gyur zhing mngon par byang chub par 'gyur
T02D3400:65a-43: ro zhes so // gzhan yang sangs rgyas dang /
T02D3400:65a-44: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis gzigs pa dang /
T02D3400:65a-45: yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /
T02D3400:65b-0: bum pa bzang po la sogs pa @65b 'jig rten dang /
T02D3400:65b-1: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D3400:65b-2: 'dis de bzhin du cho ga spyir khyad par du 'phags pa'i rim par blta ba'am /
T02D3400:65b-3: cho ga rgyud las bltas na the tshom med par
T02D3400:65b-4: nges par bsgrubs pas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro zhes
T02D3400:65b-5: so // 'dir thabs dang ldan pa rnams kyis sgrub
T02D3400:65b-6: thabs kyi cho gas ji ltar nus pa bzhin bsgrub
T02D3400:65b-7: so // par bya'o // ji ltar gsungs pa bdag gis nus pa bzhin bya'o //
T02D3400:65b-8: mthar gcig pu yang bdag nyid srung bar byas nas /
T02D3400:65b-10: mchod pa la sogs pa yid kyis byas nas /
T02D3400:65b-11: de'i sngags brjod cing ji srid 'dod kyi bar du bzlas shing bsgrubs pas /
T02D3400:65b-12: brtson 'grus dang mthun pa gnyis las kyi rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub nges par 'gyur ro //
T02D3400:65b-13: gcig gis kyang 'jig rten gsum bsrung nus par rgyud las gsungs so //
T02D3400:65b-14: don yod grub pa 'di yang dam tshig gsum gyi
T02D3400:65b-15: rgyal po las bgegs med pa'i dngos grub tu 'gyur
T02D3400:65b-16: te / yid la 'dod pa'i rnam pa nyid //
T02D3400:65b-18: sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs pa'i cho ga dang bral yang /
T02D3400:65b-20: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dmigs pa tsam byas nas /
T02D3400:65b-21: sems kyis sngags bzlas par bya'o //
T02D3400:65b-22: 'dir yang gang dang gang gi cho ga yid kyis
T02D3400:65b-23: 'dod pas sngags pa rnams sgrub pa dang ldan pas
T02D3400:65b-25: ji ltar 'dir gsungs pa dben zhing skye bo med
T02D3400:65b-26: pa'i gnas su smra ba yongs su spangs nas sems
T02D3400:65b-27: can rnams la gnod pa ma yin pas mchod pa
T02D3400:65b-28: med pa dang / stan med pa dang khrus ma
T02D3400:65b-29: byas pa la sogs pa cho ga'i tshogs ma tshang
T02D3400:65b-30: ba yang nges par bsgrubs pas dngos grub tu 'gyur
T02D3400:65b-31: med pa dang / ro // yang gsungs te /
T02D3400:65b-32: 'dir yang shin tu ngo mtshar ba gnyis te /
T02D3400:65b-33: sngags rnams kyis ji lta ji ltar bsgrubs pa'i mtha'
T02D3400:65b-34: la de lta de ltar rjes su mthun par 'gyur
T02D3400:65b-35: ro // yang gang dang gang gi cho ga sbyor
T02D3400:65b-36: ba'i mtha' la de'i mtha' bzhin du dngos grub tu
T02D3400:65b-37: ro // 'gyur ro // slar yang gsungs pa /
T02D3400:65b-38: gang gis byang chub sems brtan zhing //
T02D3400:65b-39: rtog pa med pa'i blo gros gyur //
T02D3400:65b-40: the tshom med pas de bzhin sgrub //
T02D3400:66a-0: de'i phyir brtson 'grus bskyed nas the tshom @66a * //
T02D3400:66a-1: med par bsgrubs pas nges par dngos grub tu 'gyur ro //
T02D3400:66a-2: 'di yang dngos grub kyi don du dam tshig mchog
T02D3400:66a-3: tu bstan par 'bad pas bsrungs par 'gyur bas de
T02D3400:66a-4: dngos grub thams cad kyi rtsa bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3400:66a-5: dam tshig de yang dam pa'i chos phyir spang bar mi bya ba dang /
T02D3400:66a-6: bla ma la smad par mi bya'o //
T02D3400:66a-8: khri la nyal bar mi bya'o //
T02D3400:66a-9: rdo rje'i rnam pa lta bu bza' bar mi bya
T02D3400:66a-10: zhing 'god par mi bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D3400:66a-11: pa ni nges par rgyud las shes par bya ste
T02D3400:66a-12: / mangs pa'i 'jigs pas 'dir ma bris so //
T02D3400:66a-13: khrus byed par 'dod na yang dam tshig gsum bzlas
T02D3400:66a-14: pa'i 'phags pa mi g-yo ba'i snying po don yod
T02D3400:66a-15: gtum pos de bzhin du rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang
T02D3400:66a-16: ldan pas sa la sogs par khrus byas pa'i rdzas
T02D3400:66a-17: thams cad la mngon par bsngags te /
T02D3400:66a-18: gdug pa can thams cad bskrad nas /
T02D3400:66a-19: mtshams la sogs pa bcad par byas pa'i mthar bgegs
T02D3400:66a-20: thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro zhes so
T02D3400:66a-21: // dam tshig gsum gyi rgyal po'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so //
